languages.text:
At the start of their turn, each enemy in the radius of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm makes WIL Save −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. On a failure, they make a free attack against the closest creature. After that, they act normal.
This effect ends if the Servoskull Swarm is destroyed. Only one Signal effect can be active.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of their turn, each enemy in the radius of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm makes WIL Save −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. On a failure, they make a free attack against the closest creature. After that, they act normal.
This effect ends if the Servoskull Swarm is destroyed. Only one Signal effect can be active.

languages.text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} penalty. Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
languages.original_text:
В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} каждый противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} и в случае провала атакует ближайшее существо (противника или союзника) вне лимита атак на ход, если это возможно. После этого противник действует обычным образом.
! Эффект этого сигнала длится, пока рой сервочерепов остается в строю или пока не использован другой сигнал.

Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.

В начале своего хода каждый противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} и в случае провала атакует ближайшее существо (противника или союзника) вне лимита атак на ход, если это возможно. После этого противник действует обычным образом.
! Эффект этого сигнала длится, пока рой сервочерепов остается в строю или пока не использован другой сигнал.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} machen alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. Jeder Gegner, dessen Probe misslingt, hat einen kostenlosen Angriff auf die nächstgelegene (verbündete oder feindliche) Kreatur. Danach verhält er sich wieder normal.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Signalfähigkeit{/g} einsetzt.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} penalty. Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn ihrer Runde machen alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. Jeder Gegner, dessen Probe misslingt, hat einen kostenlosen Angriff auf die nächstgelegene (verbündete oder feindliche) Kreatur. Danach verhält er sich wieder normal.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere Signalfähigkeit einsetzt.

languages.text:
Au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. Ceux qui échouent effectuent une attaque gratuite sur la créature la plus proche (alliée ou ennemie), si possible. Ils agissent ensuite normalement.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de signal.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} penalty. Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au début de leur tour, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. Ceux qui échouent effectuent une attaque gratuite sur la créature la plus proche (alliée ou ennemie), si possible. Ils agissent ensuite normalement.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre capacité de signal.

languages.text:
所有距离伺服头骨集群4格内的敌人，在各自的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}减值。所有未能通过检定的敌人在可能的情况下，都会对距离最近的生物（不分敌我）进行一次无消耗攻击。攻击之后，受影响的敌人会正常行动。
！此信号的效果始终持续，直到伺服头骨集群被摧毁或使用其他信号{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} penalty. Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
所有距离伺服头骨集群4格内的敌人，在各自的回合开始时，都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}减值。所有未能通过检定的敌人在可能的情况下，都会对距离最近的生物（不分敌我）进行一次无消耗攻击。攻击之后，受影响的敌人会正常行动。
！此信号的效果始终持续，直到伺服头骨集群被摧毁或使用其他信号能力。

languages.text:
Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cada enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos hace una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. Los enemigos que fallan la prueba lanzan un ataque gratuito contra la criatura más cercana (sea amiga o enemiga). Después actúa con normalidad.
! Este efecto de señal dura hasta que el enjambre de servocráneos queda destruido o usa otra {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de señal.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} penalty. Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Al principio de su turno, cada enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos hace una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}. Los enemigos que fallan la prueba lanzan un ataque gratuito contra la criatura más cercana (sea amiga o enemiga). Después actúa con normalidad.
! Este efecto de señal dura hasta que el enjambre de servocráneos queda destruido o usa otra capacidad de señal.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各敵は−{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗すると、該当する場合に、最も近い生物（味方または敵）に自由に攻撃する。その後、通常通り行動する。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナル{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するまで継続する。
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} penalty. Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
ターン開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各敵は−{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}のペナルティで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。失敗すると、該当する場合に、最も近い生物（味方または敵）に自由に攻撃する。その後、通常通り行動する。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナルアビリティを使用するまで継続する。

ターン開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各敵は−{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6}のペナルティで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。失敗すると、該当する場合に、最も近い生物（味方または敵）に自由に攻撃する。その後、通常通り行動する。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナルアビリティを使用するまで継続する。

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girer. Başarısız olan düşmanlar, mümkünse en yakındaki yaratığa (dost veya düşman) serbest saldırı yaparlar. Ardından normal hareketlerine dönerler.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanana dek sürer.
languages.original_text:

Each enemy that fails makes a free attack against the closest creature (ally or enemy), if possible. After that, they act normally.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman, turu başladığında −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} ceza puanına sahip bir İrade direnç testine girer. Başarısız olan düşmanlar, mümkünse en yakındaki yaratığa (dost veya düşman) serbest saldırı yaparlar. Ardından normal hareketlerine dönerler.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal kabiliyeti kullanana dek sürer.

Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında −{uip|WILSave|6fe07c288ab442c4b70d4e9d535a6cb6} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girer. Başarısız olan düşmanlar, mümkünse en yakındaki yaratığa (dost veya düşman) serbest saldırı yaparlar. Ardından normal hareketlerine dönerler.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanana dek sürer.
